title: The Story of a Poor Lady Being Mistaken as the Saint - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Adventurers   Beastkin   Dungeons   Elemental Magic   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Money Grubber   Poor Protagonist   Reincarnation   Reverse Harem
author: Mazi Manzi   馬路まんじ
description:
The Story of a Poor Lady Being Mistaken as the Saint ~When She Worked to Earn Money, She Ended Up With a Harem of Princes?!~

The poor lady, Sophia, turned to the world of adventuring because of her difficult life and lost said life inside a dungeon one day. However, in the very next moment, she returned to the moment she was born.

“I swear that I’ll earn so much money to live a normal life!”

With that earnest reason in mind, she refined herself, but why were all these princes gathering around her…?!>
